title: About
text: I’m Camdyn Beirow, a student at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln studying sports media communcations and broadcasting.

title: Will Victor Wembanyama be the 2026 NBA MVP?
text:
The Most Valuable Player, the NBA’s most desired player award


Code
library(hoopR)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)


mvp_seasons <- c(2025, 2024, 2023, 2026)

all_data <- load_nba_player_box(seasons =  mvp_seasons)

mvp_comparison_data <- all_data |>
  filter(season_type == 2,
         (athlete_display_name == "Shai Gilgeous-Alexander" & season == 2025) |
         (athlete_display_name == "Nikola Jokic" & season == 2024) |
         (athlete_display_name == "Joel Embiid" & season == 2023) |
         (athlete_display_name == "Victor Wembanyama" & season == 2026))

mvp_avgs <- mvp_comparison_data |>
  group_by(athlete_display_name, season) |>
  summarise(
    games = n(),
    ppg = mean(points, na.rm = TRUE),
    rpg = mean(rebounds, na.rm = TRUE),
    apg = mean(assists, na.rm = TRUE),
    bpg = mean(blocks, na.rm = TRUE),
    spg = mean(steals, na.rm = TRUE),
    minutes = mean(minutes, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) |>
  ungroup()

mvp_avgs_long <- mvp_avgs |>
  select(athlete_display_name, season, ppg, rpg, apg) |>
  pivot_longer(cols = c(ppg, rpg, apg), 
               names_to = "statistic", 
               values_to = "value")

first_10_games <- all_data |>
  filter(season_type == 2,
         (athlete_display_name == "Shai Gilgeous-Alexander" & season == 2025) |
         (athlete_display_name == "Nikola Jokic" & season == 2024) |
         (athlete_display_name == "Joel Embiid" & season == 2023) |
         (athlete_display_name == "Victor Wembanyama" & season == 2026)) |>
  arrange(athlete_display_name, game_date) |>
  group_by(athlete_display_name, season) |>
  filter(row_number() <= 10) |>
  ungroup()

first_10_avgs <- first_10_games |>
  group_by(athlete_display_name, season) |>
  summarise(
    games = n(),
    ppg = mean(points, na.rm = TRUE),
    rpg = mean(rebounds, na.rm = TRUE),
    apg = mean(assists, na.rm = TRUE),
    bpg = mean(blocks, na.rm = TRUE),
    spg = mean(steals, na.rm = TRUE),
    minutes = mean(minutes, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) |>
  ungroup() |>
  mutate(player_season = paste(athlete_display_name, season))

season_2026_data <- load_nba_player_box(seasons = 2026) |>
  filter(season_type == 2)  

player_avgs_2026 <- season_2026_data |>
  group_by(athlete_display_name) |>
  summarise(
    games = n(),
    ppg = mean(points, na.rm = TRUE),
    rpg = mean(rebounds, na.rm = TRUE),
    apg = mean(assists, na.rm = TRUE),
    bpg = mean(blocks, na.rm = TRUE),
    spg = mean(steals, na.rm = TRUE),
    minutes = mean(minutes, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) |>
  ungroup() |>
  filter(ppg >= 15 & rpg >= 5)
  
  wemby26avg <- player_avgs_2026 |>
  filter(athlete_display_name == "Victor Wembanyama")
  
  cumulative_stocks <- first_10_games |>
  arrange(athlete_display_name, game_date) |>
  group_by(athlete_display_name, season) |>
  mutate(
    game_number = row_number(),
    stocks = steals + blocks,
    cumulative_stocks = cumsum(stocks)
  ) |>
  ungroup() |>
  mutate(player_season = paste(athlete_display_name, season))

fg_pct_minutes <- season_2026_data |>
  group_by(athlete_display_name) |>
  summarise(
    games = n(),
    fg_attempted = sum(field_goals_attempted, na.rm = TRUE),
    fg_made = sum(field_goals_made, na.rm = TRUE),
    fg_pct = fg_made / fg_attempted,
    ppg = mean(points, na.rm = TRUE),
    mpg = mean(minutes, na.rm = TRUE)  
  ) |>
  ungroup() |>
  filter(fg_attempted >= 50)

wemby_fg_minutes <- fg_pct_minutes |>
  filter(athlete_display_name == "Victor Wembanyama")


ggplot(data= mvp_avgs_long, aes(x = athlete_display_name, y = value, fill = statistic)) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "MVP Seasons vs Wembanyama: main three stats comparison",
       x = "Player",
       y = "Per Game Average",
       fill = "Statistic") +
  theme_minimal()

vghjkl;lhgfgk


Code
ggplot(player_avgs_2026, aes(x = ppg, y = rpg))  +
  geom_point(
    data = player_avgs_2026,
    aes(x = ppg, y = rpg), color = "black", alpha = .7
  ) +
  geom_point(
    data = wemby26avg,
    aes(x = ppg, y = rpg), color = "red", alpha = 1, size = 3
  ) +
  geom_text(data = wemby26avg, aes(x = 28, y = 13.4, label = "Victor Wembanyama"),
    size = 3
  ) +
  labs(title = "2026 NBA Points and Rebound Averages",
       subtitle = "When it comes to points and rebounding, wemby is among little company",
       x = "Points Per Game",
       y = "Rebounds Per Game",
       caption = "By: Camdyn Beirow | Data Source: Hoopr") +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 20, face = "bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 12), 
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size=10)
    ) 









sdfghjkl./lkjhgfd


Code
ggplot(data= cumulative_stocks, aes(x = game_number, y = cumulative_stocks, 
                             color = player_season, group = player_season)) +
  geom_step(linewidth = 1.2) +
  geom_point(size = 2) +
  labs(title = "Wemby's Stock is Through the Roof",
       subtitle = "And not just his value, but his Stock Steal and Block stat combo towers among his former MVP peers",
       x = "Games", 
       y = "Cumulative Stocks (Steals + Blocks)",
       caption = "By: Camdyn Beirow | Data Source: Hoopr") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:10) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 20, face = "bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 12), 
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size=10)
    ) 











Code
ggplot(data= fg_pct_minutes, aes(x = ppg, y = fg_pct)) +
  geom_point(aes(size = mpg), color = "gray", alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_point(data = wemby_fg_minutes, aes(x = ppg, y = fg_pct, size = mpg), 
             color = "red", alpha = 1) +
  geom_text(data = wemby_fg_minutes, aes(label = "Victor Wembanyama"),
            hjust = -0.1, vjust = 0.3, size = 3.5, color = "red") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) +
  scale_size_continuous(range = c(1, 6)) +
  labs(title = "2026 NBA Season: Scoring Efficiency vs Volume",
       subtitle = "Field Goal Percentage vs Points Per Game (Wemby in red)\nPoint size = Minutes Per Game",
       x = "Points Per Game",
       y = "Field Goal Percentage",
       size = "Minutes Per Game",
caption = "By: Camdyn Beirow | Data Source: Hoopr") +
  theme_minimal()
